DOC.criteria: Regular diet 3 meal day ( minimal 5 time week ) BMI 18.5 27 kg/m2 Calorie restrict diet special diet study last month prior study Antibiotics month prior study Former surgery gastrointestinal tract , exception appendectomy use follow type medication effect gastrointestinal tract last 2 week prior study ( spasmolytica , antidiarrhea , anticonstipation , probiotic ) Chronic disease gastrointestinal tract Crohn 's disease , ulcerative colitis , irritable bowel syndrome , chronic constipation , chronic frequent diarrhea , clinically relevant lactose intolerance Pregnancy , pregnancy desire breastfeeding Diabetes ( type 1 2 ) Blood donation past 3 month prior study Abnormal hemoglobin ( Hb ) level blood , men must Hb level 14.0 18.0 g / dL woman 12.0 16.0 g / dL Participation study past year radiation use .
